If not, see . */ + package org.neo4j.kernel.lifecycle; /** @@ -24,12 +25,12 @@ package org.neo4j.kernel.lifecycle; * followed by start, * and then any number of stop-start sequences, * and finally stop and shutdown. - * + *

* As a stop-start cycle could be due to change of configuration, please perform anything that depends on config * in start(). - * + *

* Implementations can throw any exception. Caller must handle this properly. - * + *

* The primary purpose of init in a component is to set up structure: instantiate dependent objects, * register handlers/listeners, etc. * Only in start should the component actually do anything with this structure.
